meanings.definition: The quality or state of being crystalline.
meanings.sent1: The crystallinity of the gemstone made it sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the crystallinity of the mineral to understand its properties.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand was so powerful that it seemed to possess a crystallinity of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a crystallinity that captivated everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The crystallinity of the snowflake was mesmerizing as it fell from the sky.

meanings.definition: The degree to which a material is composed of crystalline structures.
meanings.sent1: The crystallinity of the rock determined its strength and durability.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the crystallinity of the metal to analyze its properties.
meanings.sent3: The cake's crystallinity was so perfect that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The crystallinity of the diamond symbolized its purity and value.
meanings.sent5: The crystallinity of the ice sculpture reflected the skill of the artist who created it.
